summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1300, for the improvement of the alley in Block Sixty (60), A. A. Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between Sixth Avenue and Seventh Avenue, from Pike Street to Union Street, by grading the same, and paving the same with vitrified brick under Ordinance No. 14240 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
